hero.title: Al-Jamia Anwar Al-Uloom Al-Islamiyyah Al-Uruf Al-Madrasa Khalifa Sahib Arghandi (RA)
hero.subtitle: Nurturing the new generation with Islamic vision and spirit
hero.description: Educate the Islamic Ummah under the light of Sharia, Tariqa, and noble values. At Anwar Al-Uloom, our academic efforts are rooted in the principles of Islamic knowledge, moral values, and the Prophetic character, guiding every student to follow the path of the Prophet (PBUH). This inspiring environment opens the doors of knowledge, spirituality, and Islamic thought — empowering learners to become beneficial not only for themselves but also for the Muslim world, their communities, and their nation’s bright future.

about.subtitle: Center of Islamic Education
about.description: For over six decades, we have been dedicated to spreading authentic Islamic knowledge and nurturing hearts and minds.
about.founderTitle: Sheikh of Quran and Hadith, Anwar al-Mashayikh
about.founderName: Hajj Khalifa Sahib Fazluddin (RA) - Known as Khalifa Sahib Arghandi
about.founderDescription: A center of Islamic education and spiritual growth that has been serving the stages of knowledge and wisdom in various regions of Afghanistan since 1963

timeline.1963Desc: Sheikh Khalifa Sahib Arghandi established the first madrasa in Arghandi, Kabul
timeline.1970sDesc: Dedicated teaching of hadith, tafsir and Islamic sciences
timeline.1985Desc: During migration, established Anwarul Uloom in Miranshah, Pakistan
timeline.2005Desc: The madrasa was re-established in Arghandi by the Sheikh's family and students
timeline.2024Desc: Continued service in Islamic education and spiritual guidance

about.academicServicesDesc: Center for Teaching Islamic and Modern Sciences

callToAction.title: Join Our Community
callToAction.description: Be part of our legacy of Islamic education and spiritual development.

biography.introduction: Anwar al-Mashayikh, the respected Maulana Khalifa Sahib Fazluddin (RA), known as Khalifa Sahib Arghandi, was one of Afghanistan's renowned scholars and great mystics.
biography.father: His father was named Muhammad Zarin, a virtuous and pious man. He studied reading and writing for about 6 years in his village school.
biography.education: He then completed the traditional religious sciences in various religious schools in Afghanistan. For the study of tafsir, he became a student of Sheikh al-Hadith Maulana Abdul Ghaffar Nangarhari, and studied under Sheikh al-Hadith Maulana Nasiruddin Gharghashtai (RA) at the Noor al-Madaris school in Ghazni.
biography.educationJourneyDesc: He completed his religious education in various madrasas across Afghanistan, studying under renowned scholars.
biography.spiritualJourneyDesc: His spiritual journey led him to become a great mystic and spiritual guide for many seekers of truth.
biography.firstMadrasaDesc: He established the first madrasa in Arghandi, Kabul, which became a center of Islamic learning.
biography.firstMadrasaTeaching: He began teaching hadith, tafsir, and Islamic sciences to students from various regions.
biography.migrationDesc: During the difficult times, he migrated and established Anwarul Uloom in Miranshah, Pakistan.
biography.migrationTeaching: He continued his teaching mission in Pakistan, serving the Muslim community there.
biography.migrationLegacy: His migration period was marked by continued dedication to Islamic education and spiritual guidance.
biography.deathDesc: He passed away leaving behind a legacy of knowledge and spiritual guidance.
biography.funeral: His funeral was attended by thousands of people from various regions.
biography.dream: Many people reported seeing him in their dreams after his passing, indicating his continued spiritual presence.
biography.brother1: His elder brother was also a scholar and teacher.
biography.brother2: His younger brother supported him in his educational mission.
famousKhalifasList: Siraj al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Ahmad Zia - Maidan Wardak, Jaghatu District
Qutb al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Din Muhammad - Paktia Province, Zormat District
Abu al-Hasan Khalifa Sahib - Logar Province
Abd al-Sattar Khalifa Sahib - Logar Province
Abd al-Rashid Khalifa Sahib - Logar Province
Mulla Kul Khalifa Sahib - Logar Province
Uthman Ghani Khalifa Sahib - Ghazni Province, Andar District
successorKhalifasList: Taj al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Saduzi Gharighi
Shams al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Din Muhammad
Najm al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Dad Muhammad Nuri
Ruh al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Abdul Hai Faqirullah
Qutb al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Muhammad Anwar Abu Zubair
Muhib al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Muhammad Miraj Ruhani
Fakhr al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Muhammad Akram Khadim
biography.reestablishmentDesc: After the family's return from migration, the madrasa was re-established in Arghandi by Taj al-Mashayikh Khalifa Sahib Saduzi Gharighi and the Sheikh's sons, scholars, and students.
biography.reestablishmentPrayer: May Allah accept this blessed re-establishment and continue the legacy of Islamic education.
biography.subjectsDescription: The madrasa teaches various Islamic sciences including Quran, Hadith, Tafsir, Fiqh, Arabic language, and other traditional subjects.
biography.subjectsNote: All subjects are taught according to traditional Islamic methodology and authentic sources.
teachersList: Mawlana Sahib Muhammad Sharif Umar Fazli
